verses.verse: The <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> for <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> even for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%> Their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> was in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
They had for their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H884>Beersheba<s%> (or <S%H7652>Sheba<s%>), <S%H4137>Moladah,<s%>
Hazar <S%H2705>Shual,<s%> <S%H1088>Balah,<s%> <S%H6107>Ezem,<s%>
<S%H513>Eltolad,<s%> <S%H1329>Bethul,<s%> <S%H2767>Hormah,<s%>
<S%H6860>Ziklag,<s%> Beth <S%H1024>Marcaboth,<s%> Hazar <S%H2701>Susah,<s%>
Beth <S%H1034>Lebaoth,<s%> and <S%H8287>Sharuhen;<s%> <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages;<s%>
<S%H5871>Ain,<s%> <S%H7417>Rimmon,<s%> <S%H6281>Ether,<s%> and <S%H6228>Ashan;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages;<s%>

and all the <S%H2691>villages<s%> that were <S%H5439>around<s%> these <S%H5892>cities<s%> to Baalath <S%H1192>Beer,<s%> <S%H7414>Ramah<s%> of the <S%H5045>South.<s%> This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

Out of the <S%H2256>part<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> was the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon;<s%> for the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> was too <S%H7227>much<s%> for <S%H1121>them.<s%> Therefore the children of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> had <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of their <S%H5157>inheritance.<s%>

The <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%> The <S%H1366>border<s%> of their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> was to <S%H8301>Sarid.<s%>

Their <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3220>westward,<s%> even to <S%H4831>Maralah,<s%> and <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H1708>Dabbesheth.<s%> It <S%H6293>reached<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3362>Jokneam.<s%>

It <S%H7725>turned<s%> from <S%H8301>Sarid<s%> <S%H6924>eastward<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrise<s%> to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of Chisloth <S%H3696>Tabor.<s%> It went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H1705>Daberath,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3309>Japhia.<s%>

From there it passed <S%H5674>along<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%> to Gath <S%H1662>Hepher,<s%> to <S%H6278>Ethkazin;<s%> and it went <S%H3318>out<s%> at <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%> which stretches to <S%H5269>Neah.<s%>
The <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> around it on the <S%H6828>north<s%> to <S%H2615>Hannathon;<s%> and it <S%H8444>ended<s%> at the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of Iphtah <S%H3317>El;<s%>
<S%H7005>Kattath,<s%> <S%H5096>Nahalal,<s%> <S%H8110>Shimron,<s%> <S%H3030>Idalah,<s%> and <S%H1035>Bethlehem:<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>
This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> these <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>
The <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> for <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> even for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>
Their <S%H1366>border<s%> was to <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> <S%H3694>Chesulloth,<s%> <S%H7766>Shunem,<s%>
<S%H2663>Hapharaim,<s%> <S%H7866>Shion,<s%> <S%H588>Anaharath,<s%>
<S%H7245>Rabbith,<s%> <S%H7191>Kishion,<s%> <S%H77>Ebez,<s%>
<S%H7432>Remeth,<s%> <S%H5873>Engannim,<s%> En <S%H5876>Haddah,<s%> and Beth <S%H1048>Pazzez.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H8396>Tabor,<s%> <S%H7831>Shahazumah,<s%> and Beth <S%H1053>Shemesh.<s%> Their <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H8444>ended<s%> at the <S%H3383>Jordan:<s%> <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>

This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>
The <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>
Their <S%H1366>border<s%> was <S%H2520>Helkath,<s%> <S%H2482>Hali,<s%> <S%H991>Beten,<s%> <S%H407>Achshaph,<s%>
<S%H487>Allammelech,<s%> <S%H6008>Amad,<s%> <S%H4861>Mishal.<s%> It <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> <S%H3220>westward,<s%> and to <S%H7884>Shihorlibnath.<s%>

It <S%H7725>turned<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrise<s%> to Beth <S%H1016>Dagon,<s%> and <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> and to the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H3317>Iphtah<s%> El <S%H6828>northward<s%> to Beth <S%H1025>Emek<s%> and <S%H5272>Neiel.<s%> It went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H3521>Cabul<s%> on the left <S%H8040>hand,<s%>
and <S%H5683>Ebron,<s%> <S%H7340>Rehob,<s%> <S%H2540>Hammon,<s%> and <S%H7071>Kanah,<s%> even to <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6721>Sidon.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> to <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> to the <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre;<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> to <S%H2621>Hosah.<s%> It <S%H8444>ended<s%> at the <S%H3220>sea<s%> by the <S%H2256>region<s%> of <S%H392>Achzib;<s%>
<S%H5981>Ummah<s%> <S%H663>also,<s%> and Aphek, and <S%H7340>Rehob:<s%> <S%H6242>twenty-two<s%> <S%H8147><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>

This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> these <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>

The <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> even for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

Their <S%H1366>border<s%> was from <S%H2501>Heleph,<s%> from the <S%H438>oak<s%> in <S%H6815>Zaanannim,<s%> <S%H129>Adaminekeb,<s%> <S%H5346><s%> and <S%H2995>Jabneel,<s%> to <S%H3946>Lakkum.<s%> It <S%H8444>ended<s%> at the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> to Aznoth <S%H243>Tabor,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> from there to <S%H2712>Hukkok.<s%> It <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> on the <S%H5045>south,<s%> and <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H836>Asher<s%> on the <S%H3220>west,<s%> and to <S%H3063>Judah<s%> at the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrise.<s%>
The <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> were <S%H6661>Ziddim,<s%> <S%H6863>Zer,<s%> <S%H2575>Hammath,<s%> <S%H7557>Rakkath,<s%> <S%H3672>Chinnereth,<s%>
<S%H128>Adamah,<s%> <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%>
<S%H6943>Kedesh,<s%> <S%H154>Edrei,<s%> En <S%H5877>Hazor,<s%>
<S%H3375>Iron,<s%> <S%H4027>Migdal<s%> <S%H2765>El,<s%> Horem, Beth <S%H1043>Anath,<s%> and Beth <S%H1053>Shemesh;<s%> <S%H8672>nineteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>

This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>
The <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>
The <S%H1366>border<s%> of their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> was <S%H6881>Zorah,<s%> <S%H847>Eshtaol,<s%> <S%H5905>Irshemesh,<s%>
<S%H8169>Shaalabbin,<s%> <S%H357>Aijalon,<s%> <S%H3494>Ithlah,<s%>
<S%H356>Elon,<s%> <S%H8553>Timnah,<s%> <S%H6138>Ekron,<s%>
<S%H514>Eltekeh,<s%> <S%H1405>Gibbethon,<s%> <S%H1191>Baalath,<s%>
<S%H3055>Jehud,<s%> Bene <S%H1139>Berak,<s%> Gath <S%H1667>Rimmon,<s%>
Me <S%H4313>Jarkon,<s%> and <S%H7542>Rakkon,<s%> with the <S%H1366>border<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H3305>Joppa.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> beyond <S%H1121>them;<s%> for the children of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3959>Leshem,<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H5221>it,<s%> and struck it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H3427>it,<s%> and lived <S%H7121>therein,<s%> and called <S%H3959>Leshem,<s%> <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> after the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> their <S%H1>father.<s%>

This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> these <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>

So they made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of distributing the <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> by its <S%H1367>borders.<s%> The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> in their <S%H8432>midst.<s%>

According to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> they <S%H5414>gave<s%> him the <S%H5892>city<s%> which he <S%H7592>asked,<s%> even <S%H8556>Timnathserah<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H669>Ephraim;<s%> and he <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and lived <S%H3427>there.<s%>

These are the <S%H5159>inheritances,<s%> which <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> distributed for <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%> So they made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H2505>dividing<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>
